content:
our future is looking swell

We're elevating our game. In an effort to upgrade our guest experience, we're thrilled to announce several upcoming hotel enhacement initiatives. 

Shorebreak Pool & Beach Access
Major improvements to our Shorebreak Pool and private beach access are underway. Closure to the pool, spa and central beach gate will occur from Nov 26th until Dec 20th. Construction noise is anticipated Monday through Friday from 10a until 4p during this time.

Ocean Lounge & Pacific Porch
Our beloved Ocean Lounge and Pacific Porch will experience a fantastic update early 2019. Closure and construction noise will be anticipated during this time.

Guest Reception
Exciting renovations to our Guest Reception will occur in early 2019. During this time, the Guest Reception will be relocated to another convenient location for our arriving and departing guests.
 
Guest Rooms
We will be refreshing key design elements in our Guest rooms beginning early 2019. The hotel will remain open throughout this project but with limited inventory.

When it comes to delivering an exceptional experience for our cherished guests, we're all in.
